qos.label: QOS
qos.help: (Optional) The QOS to be used for message exchanges. Default: 0

user.label: Username
user.help: (Optional) The username to use if you want to authenticate incoming traffic.

password.label: Password
password.help: (Optional) The password to use if you want to authenticate incoming traffic.

dataTopic.label: Data Topic
dataTopic.help: (Optional) The topic to listen to for device data. Default reekoh/data

commandTopic.label: Command Topic
commandTopic.help: (Optional) The topic to listen to for device messages or commands. Default: reekoh/commands

authorizedTopics.label: Authorized Topics
authorizedTopics.help: (Optional) Other, comma-separated, authorized topics the devices can subscribe from and/or publish to.
